app_descript:
Informed Delivery

Informed Delivery is an innovative app designed by USPS to enhance your mail tracking and management. With this app, users can effortlessly monitor their incoming mail and packages, ensuring they're always in the loop regarding their deliveries.

Brief

Informed Delivery offers a smart, user-friendly system that transforms how you interact with your postal mail and packages. This USPS-offered service helps you to keep an eye on your incoming mail, respond to certain mailer content, and handle your packages efficiently from the convenience of your mobile device.

Price

ğŸ’µ Informed Delivery is a free service offered by USPS, thus there are no costs associated with downloading or using the app. There are no in-app purchases, making this a cost-effective choice for tracking deliveries.

Crafted with meticulous attention to user convenience and security, Informed Delivery revolutionizes the traditional mailbox experience by ensuring you're well-informed and in control of your mail and packages.
